basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period September
basic.color: Flower color green, red, fruit color light gray, yellow brown, green

maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic to slightly alkaline soil
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, put in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water the roots 2-3 times every month when dry
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers once to twice to young tree every year
maintenance.pruning: Remove diseased and dead leaves timely
